Smyrna.Powers Park, Georgia:
Powers Park is an unincorporated community located east-southeast of Marietta in Cobb County, Georgia, United States.
The community is defined by Interstate 75 to the southwest, Fern Street / Smithstone Road to the southeast, Lower Roswell Road to the northeast and South Marietta Parkway to the northwest. Powers Creek, Little Road and Powers Ferry Road run through the heart of the area.
